task_list.docs_info:
## stitching_task
Stitches FOVs from an OME-Zarr image.

Performs registration and fusion of FOVs indicated
in the FOV_ROI_table of the OME-Zarr image. Writes the
fused image back to a "fused" group in the same Zarr array.
